tool_description: Analyzes customer wait times, queue performance, and service level adherence to identify bottlenecks and optimization opportunities.

analysis_timeframe.description: Timeframe for wait time analysis (hourly, daily, weekly)

service_level_target.description: Target service level percentage (e.g., 80 for 80% of calls answered within target time)

include_callback_requests.description: Whether to include callback requests in wait time analysis

error_messages: Invalid analysis timeframe: Use 'hourly', 'daily', or 'weekly' for analysis timeframe.
Invalid service level target: Service level target must be between 1 and 100.
Invalid target answer time: Target answer time must be a positive integer in seconds.
Insufficient data: Not enough call data available for meaningful wait time analysis.
usage: Provide analysis_timeframe as required parameter. Optionally set service_level_target, target_answer_time, and include_callback_requests to customize the wait time analysis parameters.

average_wait_time.description: Average customer wait time in seconds

longest_wait_time.description: Longest recorded wait time in seconds

calls_exceeding_target.description: Number of calls that exceeded target answer time

peak_wait_periods.description: Time periods with highest average wait times
